title: LFM -Triad Steel- Gold 5 +
body:
My name is Dean and i'm looking for new members to join a club I just made.
Requirements:
17+
Discord.
Microphone with no background noise / keyboard clicks (any mic can be optimized to stop this, look in to it)
No flamers.

Add me on League:
Bubbielift

Fill this out if you're looking for a team and send it to me via league <3

Name:
Age:
Where your from:
Were you banned in season 7 / Pre-Season?
If yes, why?
Reason you're looking for a team:

EDIT: 2 MORE SPOTS PREF JUNGLE / TOP / SUPPORT{{champion:34}} 
EDIT: SLOTS FILLED LOOKING FOR FILLS AND SUBS, OUR MAIN 5 ARE ON 5PM-10PM WEEKDAYS SO LOOKING FOR PLAYERS WITH DIFFERENT TIME PREFERENCES
Edit: Looking for an active mid laner. 4-10pm weekdays
